alert.note: Alert for Central Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 26 at 1:50AM AKST until December 26 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 inches for a storm total of 8 to 10 inches. * WHERE...The Central Brooks Range from Atigun Pass and Anaktuvuk Pass South. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan for difficult travel conditions. Visibility will be one half mile or less at times. Deep snow will make travel difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snow will taper off this afternoon. South winds gusting to 35 mph in Atigun Pass will cause very low visibility in the pass. Snow amounts will be 2-4 inches north of the passes.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
